member.summary: Exception is thrown when a section name parameter has invalid format.

member.name: M:GameLauncher_WPF.INIFileManager.File.Exist
member.summary: Checks whether the initialization file exist.
member.returns: True if initialization file exist, otherwise False.

member.name: M:GameLauncher_WPF.INIFileManager.File.Create(System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Creates the initialization file. If the file already exist it would be replaced.
member.param: The Text encoding to write the initialization file.
member.returns: True if the operation success, otherwise False.

member.name: M:GameLauncher_WPF.INIFileManager.File.Delete
member.summary: Deletes the initialization file.
member.returns: True if the operation success, otherwise False.

member.name: M:GameLauncher_WPF.INIFileManager.File.Get(System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Returns the initialization file content.
member.param: The Text encoding to read the initialization file.

member.name: M:GameLauncher_WPF.INIFileManager.File.Sort(System.Boolean,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Sort the initialization file content by the Key names. If the initialization file contains sections then the sections are sorted by their names also.
member.param: Remove empty lines.
The Text encoding to read the initialization file.
member.returns: True if the operation success, otherwise False.

member.name: M:GameLauncher_WPF.INIFileManager.File.Write(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Writes a new initialization file with the specified text content..
member.param: Indicates the text content to write in the initialization file.
The Text encoding to read the initialization file.
member.returns: True if the operation success, otherwise False.

member.name: M:GameLauncher_WPF.INIFileManager.Key.Exist(System.String,System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Return a value indicating whether a key name exist or not.
member.param: Indicates the key name that contains the value to modify.
Indicates the Section name where to find the key name.
The Text encoding to write the initialization file.
member.returns: True if the key name exist, otherwise False.

member.name: M:GameLauncher_WPF.INIFileManager.Key.Set(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.param: Indicates the key name that contains the value to modify.
Indicates the new value.
Indicates the Section name where to find the key name.
The Text encoding to write the initialization file.
member.returns: True if the operation success, otherwise False.

member.name: M:GameLauncher_WPF.INIFileManager.Key.Get(System.String,System.Object,System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Get the value of an existing key name. If the initialization file or else the Key doesn't exist then a 'Nothing' object is returned.
member.param: Indicates the key name to retrieve their value.
Indicates a default value to return if the key name is not found.
Indicates the Section name where to find the key name.
The Text encoding to read the initialization file.

member.name: M:GameLauncher_WPF.INIFileManager.Key.GetIndex(System.String,System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Returns the initialization file line index of the key name.
member.param: Indicates the Key name to retrieve their value.
Indicates the Section name where to find the key name.
The Text encoding to read the initialization file.

member.name: M:GameLauncher_WPF.INIFileManager.Key.Remove(System.String,System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Remove an existing key name.
member.param: Indicates the key name to retrieve their value.
Indicates the Section name where to find the key name.
The Text encoding to read the initialization file.
member.returns: True if the operation success, otherwise False.

member.name: M:GameLauncher_WPF.INIFileManager.Section.Add(System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Adds a new section at bottom of the initialization file.
member.param: Indicates the Section name to add.
The Text encoding to read the initialization file.
member.returns: True if the operation success, otherwise False.

member.name: M:GameLauncher_WPF.INIFileManager.Section.Get(System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Returns all the keys and values of an existing Section Name.
member.param: The Text encoding to read the initialization file.
Indicates the section name where to retrieve their keynames and values.

member.name: M:GameLauncher_WPF.INIFileManager.Section.GetNames(System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Returns all the section names of the initialization file.
member.param: The Text encoding to read the initialization file.

member.name: M:GameLauncher_WPF.INIFileManager.Section.Has(System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the initialization file contains at least one Section.
member.param: The Text encoding to read the initialization file.
member.returns: True if the INI contains at least one section, otherwise False.

member.name: M:GameLauncher_WPF.INIFileManager.Section.Remove(System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Removes an existing section with all of it's keys and values.
member.param: Indicates the Section name to remove with all of it's key/values.
The Text encoding to read the initialization file.
member.returns: True if the operation success, otherwise False.
